body_html:
Yeah, there is code in graph_partition.cc that looks at host memory attributes to know whether to add send/recv nodes, so some of this is handled already.

I also agree that XLA would be a better long term bet for new devices -- to get a proof of concept, it probably makes sense to develop short-term workarounds rather than trying to do anything sophisticated with automatic device placement :)
